note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Cs-claf
body:
# CLAF

CLAF is the Command Line Application Framework.

This project will mean writing command line programs will be as easy as writing the methods themselves. Absolutely no time spent on re-writing the wheel of providing help about commands.

For information see:
* [Code](https://github.com/MattDiesel/cs-claf)
* [Wiki](https://github.com/MattDiesel/cs-claf/wiki)
* [Project Objectives](https://github.com/MattDiesel/cs-claf/wiki/Project-Objectives)
